parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided text.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions and endorses Cǎlin Georgescu, implicitly contrasting him with a USR candidate. While not naming a specific USR candidate, the context clearly indicates an electoral preference.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed for broad public reach. The content addresses general concerns and opinions, not a private conversation.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The endorsement of Cǎlin Georgescu and the criticism of a USR candidate are clearly intended to influence voters' choices in the upcoming election. The post aims to sway public opinion in favor of Georgescu.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post presents some observations about societal issues, it primarily serves as an opinion piece advocating for a specific candidate. It lacks the objectivity and journalistic standards expected of news reporting or analysis.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. Although presented as a personal opinion, the endorsement of a candidate and the criticism of another clearly transcends personal expression and enters the realm of electoral campaigning.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>928392119243935</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by Mircea Cirt, promotes Cǎlin Georgescu and criticizes a USR candidate.  This directly influences the electoral process by advocating for a specific candidate. The post's broad reach via a paid Facebook campaign targets a wide audience, fulfilling the criteria of electoral propaganda as defined in Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. The post's objective is clearly to influence voters' choices, making it electoral propaganda. The fact that it was posted after the official campaign period ended further strengthens the case for a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Cǎlin Georgescu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>[Unspecified USR Candidate]</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Mircea Cirt, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 928392119243935) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidatul Cǎlin Georgescu și denigrează implicit un candidat USR, având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea lui Georgescu. Postarea, fiind plătită și având o vizibilitate extinsă, îndeplinește toate criteriile propagandei electorale conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGEA nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, fiind interzisă după încheierea perioadei de campanie. Fraze precum „Voi vota Cǎlin Georgescu, nicidecum un candidat USR!” demonstrează clar intenția de a influența votul.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
